plot: Homer and Marge find the perfect young couple and ask them to be the guardians for the kids in case something happens to them.

Having survived a tornado Marge and Homer ponder their mortality and consider who might be suitable guardians for the children should they die. However everybody they approach is unsuitable or unwilling - until they meet the cool and liberal Mav and Portia, who agree to have the children on a trial weekend. Unfortunately the pair want to keep the kids for themselves and Marge and Homer have to launch a rescue attempt.—don @ minifie-1
